snippet.title: Blu Water Day Spa
snippet.description:
* 4.
Blu Water Day Spa
?
5234 Nicholson Ln
Spa • View Menu •
On the menu: LED Light Treatment: LED light therapy is an FDA-approved cosmetic procedure that is gentle, painless, safe & effective. unique photopulsation technology uses light emitting diodes (LED’s) to diminish fine lines, wrinkles & age spots while tightening pores, plumping & smoothing the skin. the LED therapy is safe for all skin types & also extremely effective w/ difficult acne cases where an ongoing acne treatment appears to have stalled.
Save
